events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and the documents look complete.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering, specifically the software developer role based on your experience.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
The initial screening went well. Your skills and background match the requirements for our software engineer position.
Thank you for the opportunity. I am excited about the role and look forward to the next steps in the hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-20 at 10:00 AM. Please confirm your availability.
You completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating excellent problem-solving and coding skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-04-25 at 2 PM. Please prepare to discuss your career goals and fit with our culture.
The HR interview went very well and your values align with the team. We will be moving forward with an offer soon.
We are pleased to offer you the software engineer position. Please review the offer details and let us know your decision.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are happy to hear that you find the terms agreeable.
I am pleased to accept the offer and excited to join the engineering team. Looking forward to starting!
Welcome aboard! Your onboarding process has been initiated to prepare you for the first day with all necessary resources.
The hiring process is now complete and your position as software engineer is officially confirmed. We are glad to have you.
